issue.title: Force deletion o a resource
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

If there is a problem with the metadata in the catalog (i.e metadata doesn't exist anymore), it is impossible to delete th associated resource. It should be possible to force the deletion in the joomla database.

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.1

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

If geonetwork returns a message that no metadata were found, user should be allowed to force deletion of easySDI resource.
If geonetwork doesn't answered (down...), resource shouldn't be deleted.
